citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:40am on 26-
APR-21. Upon arrival to the facility, the licensee was reached by phone and stated no responsible adult would be
available for an inspection within 60 minutes.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission  of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:40am on 26-
APR-21. Upon arrival to the facility, the licensee was reached by phone and stated no responsible adult would be 
available for an inspection within 60 minutes. 
 
 
 
End Section
